product_name: Big Agnes Scout Plus UL2 Tent
long_description: The ultralight, 3-season, 2-person, single-wall Scout Plus UL2 tent uses your trekking poles (not included) to set up. Carry less than a pound per person for a waterproof shelter and vestibule. Scout Plus features 1 large, easy-entry front door and vestibule. Set up the tent with 1 trekking pole on the inside at the back end and another on the outside at the door. Single wall design has front and rear vents to keep air circulating inside the tent; vents are lined with polyester mesh to keep the bugs out. Reflective guylines and webbing at tent corners enhance nighttime visibility. Silicone-treated ripstop nylon with waterproof polyurethane coating is durable and lightweight. Waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (no PVC or VOCs) seals all seams; waterproof door help keep tent dry. The Big Agnes Scout Plus UL2 tent features 2 built-in, bin-shaped storage shelves and gear loft loops (gear loft sold separately). Includes stuff sacks and 13 superlight aluminum J stakes.
short_description: The ultralight, 3-season, 2-person, single-wall Scout Plus UL2 tent uses your trekking poles (not included) to set up. Carry less than a pound per person for a waterproof shelter and vestibule.
